mapper.select: SELECT name, code, type, comment FROM role
SELECT TYPE,CODE,NAME,`GROUP` FROM ROLE GROUP BY TYPE,CODE, NAME, `GROUP`;
SELECT R.NAME, R.CODE, CASE WHEN U.ID IS NOT NULL THEN COUNT(U.ID) ELSE 0 END AS USERNUM FROM ROLE R LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON R.CODE = U.ROLE_CODE AND U.USEYN = 'Y' GROUP BY R.CODE;
